CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 27,1945, pg. 1, reads: "Carol Brice and Fritz Reiner shake hands at the completion of their concert Sunday afternoon, when the songbird did several numbers with the Pittsburgh Symphony Orchestra, of which Mr. Reiner is conductor. - Courier Photo by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Contralto Carol Brice shaking hands with Pittsburgh Symphony conductor Fritz Reiner, in Syria Mosque with photograph on wall inscribed to James Barber from Paul
